listing.listing_description:
Explore the coast of Australia's easternmost edge and return to alfresco dinners and bottles of locally produced wine. An easy walk from Belongil Beach and Byron Bay town, this stand-alone villa offers a contemporary, family-friendly vision of the classic oceanside home, with high-end cooking and media technology, a private pool, and 4 split-king or twin bedrooms.

Part of a new complex of 2-story homes, the villa features an ample outdoor living area for relaxing in privacy. A plunge pool and sun patio beckon you into the exquisite light, while the shaded deck offers cool shelter for barbeque meals and serene hours in the open-air lounge.

Glass walls open to the interior great room, forming a seamless, indoor/outdoor space. A fully equipped kitchen serves the 2 dining tables, a breakfast bar, and a TV lounge with cozy sectional. Fresh white surfaces glow with natural light and showcase the villa's original, sea-inspired artwork. Central air conditioning and heating allow you to modulate the atmosphere to your desire.

There are 2 bedrooms on each level of the home. The master and primary guest suite are on the lower level, each featuring an ensuite bathroom with rain shower. The guestrooms on the upper level enjoy a private TV lounge and shared bathroom. All of the rooms have air conditioning, ceiling fans, and twin beds that can be arranged as kings.

Fat Frog Beach House is just a 7-minute walk from Byron Bay town, and about 10 minutes from Belongil Beach, while Byron Main Beach is a four-minute drive away. You're also within 10 minutes of the iconic Cape Byron Lighthouse and the sublime seascapes of Arakwal National Park.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Find peace and tranquility at this hillside home set amongst lush greenery on the outskirts of Avalon Village. Look out over the waterway below from multi-level balconies. Relax under the shade of a beach umbrella while the kids splash around in the pool. Then, explore Avalon and the 6 beach areas in 10 minutes’ drive. Or, take a day trip to Sydney and check out the skyline from a rooftop bar.

Trendy white interiors are the perfect contrast to Australia’s rugged, lush environment. Gather the group for memorable meals at one of 3 alfresco dining sets, or find your own smaller sitting area for a romantic escape with that special someone. A pair of open concept kitchen/dining/lounge areas make it easy for multiple families to vacation together.

After dinner, mix a cocktail and look out over the waterway from the lounge on the upper balcony. When the sun has set, gather around the fire pit and toast marshmallows. When the kids go to bed, stretch out in the sunbed and do some stargazing or curl up by the fireplace and pick a series to binge on Smart TV. Then, take one last look at the moonlit ocean from the master’s balcony before bed.

If you’re in the mood to shop, Sydney’s Oxford Street is lined with boutique fashion houses. The top end of the street has the Wine Library, a great place to rest and enjoy the locally-crafted wine. For dinner, Bondi Road, just off the beach, has some of the city’s best restaurants. And, George Street is where you’ll find the Sydney Opera House, Harbour Bridge, and plenty of bars and nightclubs. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Celebrating its beautiful beachfront location, Villa Gita Segara merges indoor and outdoor spaces seamlessly to create a unique atmosphere for an unforgettable Balinese vacation for a group of eight. The villa is nestled into a well-manicured coconut grove, making use of two separate pavilions linked by tropical gardens and the swimming pool to enhance the open-air environment. All four king en-suite bedrooms enjoy ocean views, as do the majority of Gita Segara’s indoor and outdoor common spaces. Nearby, you’ll find golf, water sports opportunities, quaint villages, and several more sandy beach areas.

Gita Segara’s Main House is where you’ll find the fully equipped kitchen, formal dining area, and spacious air-conditioned living room, as well as the master bedroom and one more king en-suite. The Guest Pavillion is home to two more beautiful bedrooms. Segara’s interior is decorated in a stately, yet peaceful manner, with deep wood tones, elegant chandelier lighting, and designer furniture. On the terrace, you’ll love the mature palm trees that outline the swimming pool and lead the eye down towards the beachfront and ocean view. On the beach, you’ll love the small terrace, complete with sun loungers and a beach umbrella.

Gita Segara comes with formal and alfresco dining settings with more than enough space for your whole group. The living room is outfitted with a Smart television, sound system, and a game console. And, you’ll surely appreciate the villa’s Wi-Fi, air conditioning, wine fridge, espresso machine, and dishwasher during your stay.

If you feel like exploring the beach beyond your own private stretch of sand, you won’t have far to go before you find yourself on Candidasa, Bias Tugel, and Blue Lagoon beaches, all are within a few kilometers. For groceries, dining, and shopping, the small village of Candidasa is within walking distance of Gita Segara. And, if there’s a golfer in your group, Bali Beach Golf Course is one of the best in the country, with oceanside fairways and challenging course design.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Take in serene Lake Wakatipu and cloud-capped Tooth Peaks from this sustainable, luxury home on the slopes of Mt Crichton. The open-plan design gives way to huge viewpoint windows, providing a peerless view of the South Island wilds. Complete with huge dining table, fun chill zones, luxurious living room and space-age kitchen, outdoor pursuits and the lights of Queensland are both close by.

Experience an exceptional kind of accommodation experience at Bob’s Cove, which erases the traditional boundaries between kitchen, leisure space, and recreation zones, facilitating a more collective experience while still providing the best of space and comfort. This wonderfully welcoming home is perched alongside a natural paradise, with the wall-length windows facilitate easy viewing. With climate control and fashionable decor complete with touches of varied world culture, guests can collectively recline in true comfort in front of the retro-styled fireplace, or find their own spots to curl up with a book or tablet. The walkways around the house ensure guests can stroll and breathe the pure air of the South Island mountains at any time of time of day or evening.

This villa is ideally placed to make the most of both New Zealand’s wilderness, and the happening action at the nearby hub of Queensland. Take to the lake for exciting kayaking or yacht outings on the pristine water, or drive to 1 of the several stunning view points to take in the natural splendor. Mountain hikers will be spoilt for choice, with local trails and more challenging peak ascents available close by. Meanwhile, the varied gastronomical hub of Queensland is just a short drive away, making for a very convenient evening outing. With the excitement of the Skycity Casino close by, guests can choose from a huge range of diverse outings.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Nothing interrupts the Lake Taupo views from these two modern homes except your own private pools. The villas may be the only civilization in 58 acres of bushland, but hot tubs, sun-splashed terraces, and airy rooms with glass walls and vaulted ceilings mean they’re quite civilized indeed. Discover the area by boat, on a cycle on the Great Lake Trail, or on a fishing trip in search of local trout.

 

Each villa has its own outdoor living areas with a swimming pool, hot tub, sitting and dining furniture, and a barbecue. In the evenings, you can flip on the gas fireplace and set the mood with the sound system, or stay in touch with the outside world via Wi-Fi. An espresso machine will fuel your outdoor adventures, and laundry facilities will help you start each activity with fresh gear.

 

Fold-away glass walls and vaulted ceilings give you the luxury of enjoying the glorious New Zealand scenery from the comfort of the wicker sofas in the villas’ living rooms. Fry up locally caught trout in the fully equipped kitchens and reconnect with friends and family around the dining tables.

 

This vacation rental includes one 2-bedroom house and one 3-bedroom house. All 5 bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, and several have lake views. While they can accommodate up to 10 guests, the smaller villa could also be a retreat for in-laws wanting a quieter holiday or a couple wanting honeymoon-style privacy.

 

The Point Estate is a 1-minute drive from the Taupo Maori Carving, which towers above the waters of the lake. It’s also a short drive from the roaring blue waters of Huka Falls, where the lake drains out of its caldera, and the shops and restaurants in the town of Taupo. Thirsty travelers can also plan to visit the craft breweries and wineries outside of downtown.

 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This enchanting luxury residence is located within Nyaman Villas, an exclusive community of six private homes located within walking distance of Seminyak Square, in Southern Bali. Designed by renowned architect Stephan Remini, the villas combine traditional Balinese ambiance, high-end amenities, and a prime location within minutes of some of the island's finest beaches and nightlife. This four-bedroom gem is ideal for families or groups of friends up to eight in size, with 570 square meters of total living space, a large outdoor swimming pool, and beautiful living and dining areas. A private staff is on hand to elevate your experience, including security services, a butler, and a villa manager. Daily breakfast is provided, and chef services (among other deluxe offerings) are available.

The villa's superb design blends interior and outdoor spaces into an airy, harmonious whole. A spacious, 75-square-meter living room greets you upon entry, along with a superb, American-style kitchen, fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and generous countertops made of hand-carved Balinese stone. The kitchen and living room open to a magnificent terrace and 92-square-meter swimming pool, set amid flowering trees and lush gardens. The pool extends beneath a shaded veranda opposite the living room, with a sumptuous daybed poised above the water.

Two bedroom suites flank the pool and daybed, each featuring 25 square meters of living space, 10-square-meter dressing areas, and semi-open bathrooms with alfresco showers and tubs. The fabulous master suite, on the upper level, features a king bed, private furnished balcony, and ensuite bathroom with alfresco shower and tub. The fourth bedroom is located near the living room and kitchen, featuring two twin beds (or one queen) and an ensuite bathroom with alfresco shower.

Nyaman Villas offers an exceptional alternative to the popular resorts around Seminyak, balancing exclusivity with convenience. Walk about five minutes to the city square, or drive five minutes to Seminyak Beach or Petitenget Beach. Ngurah Rai International Airport is only twelve kilometers away, and round-trip airport transfer is included in your vacation rental—making it an excellent choice for destination wedding guests.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Rangy mountains loom in the distance and rolling hills nestle this sleek architectural masterpiece on New Zealand’s North Island. Designed by Brendon Gordon Architecture and rendered in natural timber and stone, this streamlined villa seems like both part of the landscape and a respite from it. While it feels secluded, it’s only a 4-minute drive to a beach, café, and more in the town of Kinloch.

Stay a while on a sunny terrace with alfresco dining for 8 and a barbecue, or set off on the provided bicycles and explore the area. If you’ve been out on the trails or the golf course all day, pour a glass from the wine fridge and settle in for the evening by a smart TV with satellite and streaming capabilities, a Sonos sound system, and Wi-Fi.

A great room lined in wall-to-wall, floor-to-ceiling glass creates the illusion of being immersed in the landscape, and sliding panels give you the luxury of opening the space to the outdoors. Cozy up on the pair of sofas in the sitting area, gather around a dining table for 8, or catch up with friends and family while perched at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.

Each of the 4 bedrooms at this vacation rental has a king bed, private ensuite bathroom, and direct access to a terrace. Three of the bedrooms have golf-course views; the fourth looks out over the garden.

A holiday at this villa is a honeymoon from the everyday—a chance to appreciate some of the country’s most dramatic scenery. Start in Kinloch, a 4-minute drive away, where you can spend a day on the beach or set off on mountain-biking trails around Lake Taupo. On the lake itself, you can try out fly fishing or book a sightseeing boat cruise. If you’re eager to tee off, ask about playing on the neighboring Kinloch Club Golf Course.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Discover a private haven in the heart of Seminyak at Villa Tangram. Though this stylish vacation rental is set in a quiet garden and offers luxury accommodations for up to fourteen, it’s close to dining, shopping and more. Reserve this villa for a getaway with family and friends, or with its sister property, Villa Abakoi, for a special birthday or anniversary celebration, or even a Bali destination wedding.

Start your holiday with a complimentary transfer to the villa and enjoy daily breakfast as well as housekeeping and chef services throughout your stay. Villa Tangram has its own pool and spacious terrace with plenty of loungers, and shares a barbecue with Villa Abakoi. In the evenings, unwind in front of the TV, set the mood with the sound system or share photos via Wi-Fi.

Inside, the villa pairs traditional Balinese elements with contemporary pieces for an ambience of classic chic. Bamboo blinds separate the open-concept living room, dining room and fully equipped kitchen from the garden and pool, and can be opened or closed to let in the breeze or create shade. Throughout the villa, artwork and objets from around Bali showcase local handiwork.

Villa Tangram has three bedrooms with queen beds, two bedrooms with two twin beds each and one bedroom with two twin-over-double bunk beds. All six bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning, and feature the same vibrant artwork as the common living areas.

During your stay, the villa manager can help arrange additional services such as an in-villa massage or even a babysitter so you can relive your honeymoon with an evening out. Walk to the famed “eat street” to sample specialties, spend an afternoon at a hip cafe, browse tempting boutiques or dance the night away at a nearby beach club. Of course, you’ll also have a choice of picturesque, relatively quiet beaches, from Seminyak to Batu Belig.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Pops of yellow echo the sunshine at this otherwise-restrained contemporary beach house just 5 minutes from the ocean. The living spaces are upstairs—all the better to look out at the Coral Sea—but there’s a pool and outdoor entertaining areas on the ground floor, too. It’s a short walk to Sunshine Beach Park, which is lined with shops and cafes for when you need a break from swimming and surfing.

When you’re not at the beach, swim in the villa’s heated pool, whip up lunch and dinner with the help of the gas barbecue and al-fresco kitchen, and sit down with a glass of Australian wine at one of two outdoor dining areas. After dark, gather around the smart TV or share holiday snapshots with friends and family at home via Wi-Fi.

Pass through the can’t-miss-it yellow door and up the sleek black metal staircase to reach the villa’s second-floor great room, where a slide-away glass wall opens to one of the outdoor dining areas and ocean views. Simplicity is king, whether in the lines of the mid-century-inspired sofa, the Lucite dining chairs, or the flat-fronted cabinets in the fully equipped kitchen.

This vacation rental has two bedrooms with private en-suite bathrooms: a master suite with a king bed, and a second bedroom with a queen bed. Two other bedrooms—one with a queen bed and one with two king single beds—share a hall bathroom. If you’ve brought the whole clan on holiday, there’s also a children’s room with four king single bunk beds and access to a hall bathroom.

A stay at Blueys Beach House gives you the luxury of walking 5 minutes from the Sunrise Beach location to Sunshine Beach Park or driving 10 minutes to Hastings Street in downtown Noosa, where you’ll find amazing espresso, one-of-a-kind gifts, and honeymoon-worthy dining. There are several other beaches within a 15-minute drive, plus two golf courses.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Magazine-worthy rooms overlook windswept coast at this designer villa just 40 minutes west of Auckland. Woven rugs and warm-toned woods give the newly remodeled interiors a welcoming vibe, and bay doors link them with outdoor areas surrounded by rugged hills. And once you’ve grabbed your gear, it’s only a 6-minute drive to Muriwai Golf Links and the surf break at Muriwai Beach.

 

Muriwai Estate sits on 16 private acres, centered around a garden designed by award-winning landscape architect Mark Read and a furnished terrace that stretches the width of the house. Follow the slopes up to a saltwater swimming pool and hot tub, and let kids romp on the play structure while grown-ups tend the barbecue and firepit.

 

Though the villa’s open-concept living room, dining room, and fully equipped kitchen take their cues from the New Zealand landscape—think woven area rugs, stone and wood accents, and natural tones—there are also plenty of surprises. Look up from a conversation with friends or family at the playful red cords on the dining-room chandelier, and examine the bird-print wallpaper that lines the powder room.

 

This vacation rental has 3 bedrooms in the main house: 2 with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, and one with a queen bed and hall bathroom. There’s also a honeymoon-worthy suite in the pool house with a king bed, en-suite bathroom, fireplace, and wet bar. For larger parties, the main house also has a spare room with 2 queen beds and a children’s room with a twin bunk bed.

 

Though it feels secluded, the villa’s location gives you the luxury of heading to the beach in the morning and coming back home for lunch. It’s only 6 minutes to the black sand and surf break of Muriwai Beach, plus Muriwai Golf Links. And no holiday here would be complete without a visit to the gannet colony, which you can reach on scenic clifftop trails.

 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Revel in beautiful design and even more beautiful views at 5A Stevens. This modern townhouse has a gorgeously open feel and, with its three bedrooms, space for up to six family members or a group of friends. Its rooms overlook the Queensland coast and the ocean beyond, and its location puts you less than a 5-minute walk from the center of Sunshine Beach.

Soak in the area’s namesake sunshine and take in the ocean views from private outdoor areas with a plunge pool, loungers, barbecue and al-fresco dining for six. For evening entertainment, the house has a media room with a TV and Bose speaker, as well as Wi-Fi; there’s also air conditioning and laundry facilities.

Inside, fold-away glass walls frame the vistas of the water. Leave them closed on cool or windy days, or open them to create one seamless indoor-outdoor living space, where the terrace flows into the open-concept living room, dining room and fully equipped kitchen. The media room is separate, so kids can watch TV while the grown-ups enjoy the luxury of uninterrupted conversation.

This well-appointed vacation rental has one bedroom with a king bed, one bedroom with a queen bed, and one bedroom with two king single beds, which are slightly larger than twin beds. The king and queen bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, while the king single bedroom has access to a hall bathroom.

A holiday at 5A Stevens means you’re only a 4-minute walk from Sunshine Beach, where you can start the day with a coffee at an oceanfront café, lounge on the sand or try surfing in the waves, and finish the evening with a honeymoon-worthy dinner at a restaurant overlooking the water. It’s also a short drive to several other beaches, plus Noosa National Park and two golf courses.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This stunning villa in Ka'anapali, along Maui's western shore, features spectacular sunset views of the Pacific Ocean and the nearby islands of Lanai and Molokai. Situated just three minutes on foot from Kahekili Beach Park and within easy reach of some of the finest beaches and golf in Hawaii, the villa enjoys the exquisite serenity and comfort of a private resort, with outstanding alfresco living areas, superb interiors, and four enchanting bedrooms, including two master suites.

Secluded amid lush tropical gardens, the ample terrace invites you to dreamy days in the Pacific breeze. Take a morning dip in the beautiful swimming pool, luxuriate on elegant sun loungers, and savor the breathtaking views. Returning from the beach in the afternoon, cook a barbecue lunch and relish it alfresco, before climbing into a hammock for a seaside siesta. At sunset, gather in the lounge for delicious cocktails and sublime vistas.

Open walls join the terrace with the interior, creating a lovely flow of space and air. Savor a bottle of fine wine in the sumptuous central lounge under soaring ceilings, or watch your favorite shows in the adjoining living room. The beautiful dining table sets the scene for festive feasts, while the luminous kitchen, under a rustic ceiling, is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances. A sitting area beside the kitchen is perfect for sipping local coffee in the morning. The villa also features an excellent fitness room.

The four bedroom suites are wonderfully elegant, spacious, and cozy, and all include deluxe ensuite bathrooms. There are two master suites, each with king bed, high ceilings, ample sitting areas, private balconies, and ocean views. One of the guest suites features a king bed, ocean views, and direct access to the terrace, while the other has two double beds, garden views, and a lovely stand-alone bath in its bathroom. With comfortable accommodations eight, Hawaiiana Hale is ideal for families and destination wedding guests.

About a three-minute walk to Kahekili Beach, you're also just two miles to Kaanapali Beach, less than three to Black Rock, and an easy drive to Puamana Beach Park and Launiopoko Beach Park. The town of Lahaina is just four miles away. Golfers are just seven miles from The Plantation at Kapalua Golf.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

HAWAII TAX ID # TA-024-679-8336-01

listing.listing_description:
Discover the spirit of another time and the luxury of today. Completed in 2015, this exquisite 5-bedroom villa shares the essence of Hawaii through traditional design touches and lush garden surroundings. You’ll find 72-121 Pakui just off the 9th hole of Hualalai Golf Course, and from your location on resort grounds you’ll have access to 5-star amenities at the nearby Four Seasons Resort Hualalai. Create unforgettable memories along Big Island’s dazzling Kailua-Kona coast in the company of friends and family.

The area was once the seat of Hawaiian royalty, and your villa is built to reflect the traditional grandeur of these polynesian palaces. Two long wings are surrounded by lush gardens, and a verdant courtyard cuts between them, leading to an open-air lounge. Lounge on designer deck furniture before cooling off in your private pool. Take your personal golf cart to the Four Seasons to enjoy fine dining, full gym, spa and much more. As the sun sets, gather your guests around the 10-place alfresco dining table for a barbecue feast.

Inside, spacious, sundrenched rooms flow effortlessly from one into another. Natural materials such as raffia ceiling panels, warm local wood and smooth stone flooring enhance the traditional ambiance. The immense great room reveals divinely soft lounge sets, and impressive landscape expressions adorn the walls. The gourmet kitchen is paradise for chefs, allowing you to prepare memorable creations on the finest stainless-steel appliance; all with captivating vistas in full view.

Elegance. There’s no better word to describe the soothing atmosphere you’ll encounter in each beautifully appointed bedrooms. From the Master suite’s towering, four-poster bed to hardwood furnishings, you’ll find uninterrupted peace and tranquility. The Master suite leads directly out to the garden. Its spa-inspired ensuite boasts a lava-rock alfresco shower. The guests bedrooms each hold king beds, and house their own ensuites.

If sand and sea lured you to Hawaii, you’ll be pleased to find a pristine stretch of sand within walking distance of your villa. Explore the lower Kona coast where you can snorkel or swim in clear, calm waters. Historic Kailua-Kona was the home of Hawaiian royalty and also offers fantastic shopping and dining options. The Big Island’s wide-open roads are made for exploring, and it is well worth visiting the island’s many coffee plantations to enjoy the flavor of Hawaii.

Copyright © 2015 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Sally is a stunning villa near Canguu along the southern coast of Bali, just minutes from Seminyak and Echo Beach. Secluded amid lush gardens and rice fields, the villa has the feel of a private resort, with high-end amenities for relaxation and entertainment, ample living areas both inside and out, and excellent staff and services including a chef, villa manager, housekeeping, and security. With four bedroom suites accommodating eight guests, Villa Sally is a dream vacation rental for families and groups of friends seeking vintage style, contemporary comforts, and a prime location in one of the most enchanting regions of Southeast Asia.

The villa's terrace evokes the cloistered feeling of a forest oasis, while offering ample space for savoring the light and breeze of the South Pacific. Enjoy long hours by the pool, sipping cool refreshments on loungers under parasols and plunging into the refreshing water in the dappled shade of tropical trees.

The capacious, open-concept veranda forms the main living space, with a sumptuous lounge overlooking the pool, an alfresco dining table, and a fully equipped kitchen. Cool tile floors, rich wood tables and walls, and beautiful artwork conjure an ambiance at once naturalistic and elegantly modern. For the night's entertainment, repair through the villa's art gallery corridor to the home theater, featuring cozy stadium seating, a large projector screen, and a piano.

There are two deluxe master suites, each with king-size bed and semi-outdoor ensuite bathroom with shower and tub. Both guest suites open to the terrace and include two twin-size beds that can be converted into kings. All of the rooms enjoy air conditioning and safes among other comforting features.

The villa is an easy walk to Finns Recreation Club, an outstanding, family-friendly complex with waterpark, tennis courts, and other activities. The beach and nightlife of Seminyak are about six kilometers away, and golfers are an easy drive to Nirwana Bali Golf Club. The iconic Tanah Lot Temple is just sixteen kilometers away. An easy drive to and from Ngurah Rai International Airport, Villa Sally is an excellent choice for destination wedding guests.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Sunshine chases the mist from vineyards, ponds, and gently rolling hills at this rural haven in the Australian countryside outside Melbourne. Accommodations are spread out between a lodge, a cottage, and the playfully named Old Laundry, all with soft Provençal colors. It’s a short drive to a selection of golf courses, beaches, and wine tastings in the heart of the Mornington Peninsula wine region.

The property’s grounds tempt guests outdoors with sculpture and cottage gardens, a tennis court, a 7-acre vineyard, and a vegetable garden teeming with fresh herbs and produce. Walk past the vineyard to spot wallabies in the bush beyond, and fire up the pizza oven and barbecue for lunch and dinner at the alfresco table. The outdoor areas allow groups up to 14 people to gather in one place.

Soft tones, natural textures, and bistro-inspired furnishings bring a little bit of France to the interiors of the lodge, cottage, and laundry. Each has its own living area, and there are 2 fully equipped kitchens and a kitchenette for flexibility. For smaller groups, you can reserve just 1 or 2 of the buildings, or all 3 to share the excitement most widely.

Spend your holiday teeing off on the 5 golf courses within 30 kilometers, or see a different side of the outdoors on a day trip to Point Nepean National Park. Visit Balnarring Beach in the morning to watch racehorses train or in the afternoon for a swim off its sandy shores.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Spanish style goes down under at this rustic retreat in the hills outside Byron Bay. Furnishings inside and out were hand-crafted by local artisans, but inspired by the breezy sophistication of European summer homes—think simple lines and a mix of textures in fabrics and finishes. Surf’s up on the Byron Bay beaches, along with snorkeling and wind sports, less than 15 kilometers from the villa.

 Entertain friends and family outdoors on the villa’s timber decks, which feature shaded al-fresco living and dining areas, then break for a swim in the 15-meter pool. Not only is the outdoor table made from 200-year-old teak, the amphitheater-like firepit was crafted from rocks pulled from the rainforest on the property. There’s also an outdoor hot tub, trampoline, wood-fired barbecue, and pizza oven, as well as a TV, Sonos sound system, and Wi-Fi indoors.

 Enjoy the luxury of indoor-outdoor living Australia style in a brick-floored great room lined in slide-away glass walls. A sloping wood-paneled roof stretches over a sunken sitting area, a dining area with seating for 16, and a fully equipped kitchen with a generous breakfast bar.

 The five bedrooms at this vacation rental are spread out over the three-bedroom Homestead, one-bedroom Barn Studio, and one-bedroom Cabin Inn. The Homestead has one master suite with a king bed and two bedrooms with two twin beds each; all three have en-suite bathrooms. The Barn Studio bedroom has a queen bed and en-suite bathroom, plus a lounge area and private entrance that make it suitable for honeymoon-style holidays. The Cabin Inn has a queen bed and hall bathroom.

 Though the villa sits on 120 acres of rolling hills in Coopers Shoot, it’s also a short drive from the popular Byron Bay beaches. Take a long stroll or surf on Belongil Beach, parts of which are clothing-optional, or bring the kids for a swim at lifeguard-patrolled Main Beach.

 Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Stay within walking distance of restaurants, boutiques and famed Noosa Head Beach at Witta Circle. Though this vacation rental is set on a quiet residential island, it’s just steps to the heart of town and some of the most beautiful beaches in Queensland. Its location—and six bedrooms—make it a wonderful choice for a holiday in the sun with family or a getaway with a group of friends.

There’s plenty of room to relax in the villa’s private outdoor areas, which feature a pool, hot tub, lounging and dining spaces, a bar and a gas barbecue. The house also has a streaming TV and Wi-Fi and, for your convenience, laundry facilities and a high chair for the younger set.

Interiors by two local designers give Witta Circle an air of laid-back luxury. The rooms are bright and modern, with a free-flowing layout that meanders from living room to dining room to fully equipped kitchen. The white walls are a gallery-like backdrop for large-scale artwork and sleek, sculptural furnishings.

The villa has three bedrooms with king beds—two with en-suite bathrooms, including the master suite—and one with a hall bathroom, as well as one bedroom with a queen bed and en-suite bathroom. There are also two children’s rooms with two twin bunk beds each that share access to a hall bathroom.

From the tranquil island where Witta Circle sits, it’s a short walk to Hastings Street and Noosa Parade, where you can treat yourself in the boutiques or sit down to a honeymoon-worthy dinner overlooking the water. It’s a 10-minute drive or less to five different beaches, including the spectacular Noosa Main Beach, and both Noosa National Park (where you’ll find even more stunning beaches) and Noosa Springs Golf and Spa Resort are equally easy to reach.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Palm trees and lush tropical greenery line the patio of this luxurious three-bedroom villa in the Wailea Beach Residence, creating a secluded environment that is are to relax and rejuvenate you and your guests. With the seclusion of a private residence and the amenities of a beachfront resort, Wailea is ideal for those who appreciate their attractions within walking distance. And, with golf, beachfront, shops, and restaurants so close, you’ll have no trouble making the most of your next amazing Luxury Retreats vacation.

From the expertly manicured lawn and garden to the rugged stone archway of the terrace, and on to the spacious living room, Wailea flows seamlessly. Inviting fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight into interior spaces is an important part of an authentic Hawaiian vacation, and with a Wailea’s open-air layout, this villa pulls it off with ease. Inside, rich wood textures, floral prints, and high-end electronics decorate the open-concept living area. In the kitchen, you’ll find granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, and an inviting breakfast bar.

On Wailea’s beautiful estate it’s easy to keep up with daily routines and experience the best of Hawaii’s laid-back island lifestyle. Keep up with your daily regiment in the fitness center, or you could trade the treadmill for a run along the sandy beachfront. After, cool off in the villa’s plunge pool, or make your way to one of Wailea’s shared pool and hot tubs.

Nearby, there are several more luxury resorts lining the coast of Maui, and Wailea provides a shuttle service so guests can enjoy some of the other beachfront clubs, bars, and restaurants in the area. The Wailea Blue golf course is also quite close, and a must-play for any golf aficionados in your group. Designed to embrace the natural characteristics of Hawaii, the Blue course enjoys scenic ocean, island, and volcano views from its many peaks and valleys.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

HAWAII TAX ID #: 167-359-2832-01

listing.listing_description:
This stunning villa is part of the world-class Hualalai Resort on Hawaii's Big Island. Situated at the entrance to Pakui Street, the villa is within walking distance of the beach at the Four Seasons, and enjoys easy access to the resort's championship golf course, spa, and other superb features. Gorgeous alfresco living spaces, sumptuous interiors, exquisite and naturalistic design, and three deluxe bedroom suites sleeping six provide a dream setting for families and groups of friends.

Bordered by beautiful volcanic rocks and lush gardens, the villa enjoys breathtaking views of the golf course and Pacific Ocean. A shapely swimming pool and hot tub seem like lagoons in a dreamy tropical clearing, inviting you to savor enchanting hours in the exquisite light. Enjoy mornings on elegant sun loungers and afternoons sipping cocktails in the comfortably furnished lanai. Returning from the beach, cook a barbecue lunch and relish it alfresco at the ocean-view table, or enjoy quiet time in the garden with furnished patio.

An open wall allows the villa's interior to breathe the ocean air. The open-concept living room, contiguous with the lanai and pool terrace, creates an expansive space for dining and entertainment. Watch the game or your favorite shows in the ample TV den, or sip pre-dinner refreshments in the adjoining cocktail lounge. Cook delicious feasts in the spacious and luminous kitchen, serving apps at the bar. When needed, repair to the office suite for work or study.

The master suite features a private terrace, stunning ocean views, an alfresco shower, and a gorgeous king bed beneath peaked ceilings with exposed wood beams and ceiling fan. There is a guest room with king bed and one with two queens; both have ensuite bathrooms and alfresco showers as well, and the double queen room opens to the terrace.

Beyond your private residence, the renowned Hualailai Resort is at your fingertips. Walk to the beach at the Four Seasons, play a game of championship golf, and indulge in the sports club and spa. You're also an easy drive to Mauna Lani Golf, Hapuna Beach, and Kailua-Kona. Kona International Airport is just eight miles away, making this a convenient vacation rental for destination wedding guests.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

HAWAII TAX ID #: TA-006-286-7456-02.

listing.listing_description:
Part of the renowned Hualali Resort on the Gold Coast of Hawaii's Big Island, this spectacular private villa features panoramic views of the Pacific Ocean and the beautiful first fairway of the resort's world-class golf course. Exquisite interior and alfresco living spaces provide a dream setting for relaxation and entertainment, while the four superb bedroom suites include ensuite bathrooms and alfresco showers. With access to the Hualalai's world-class amenities, including the Four Seasons Hualalai Beach, this vacation rental offers an extraordinary balance of privacy and convenience on one of the world's most spectacular shores.

Enjoy enchanting days bathing in the villa's hot tub and heated infinite swimming pool, relaxing on lovely loungers and beholding the panoramic ocean vistas. At lunchtime, relish a barbecue meal alfresco in the cool shade of the lanai, and linger in the lounge in the evening, sipping Hawaiian cocktails as the sunset transforms land, sea, and sky.

An open wall joins the lanai with the interior great room, creating a lovely flow of space and air. Peaked ceilings of pickled wood, gorgeous tile floors, and beautiful chandeliers and fans evoke consummate Hawaiian class. Prepare dinner in the fully equipped gourmet kitchen, and gather together at the superb dining table. At night, sip wine in the elegant lounge, or retire to the wonderfully cozy media room. In the morning, enjoy fresh fruit and Hualalai Trading Company coffee at the breakfast bar or in the sunroom.

The main house includes three bedrooms suites, two with king beds and one with two twins, while the Ohana includes a fourth bedroom, with king bed. All of the bedrooms have ensuite bathrooms and exquisite alfresco showers, as well as access to outdoor living areas. The master suite features a walk-in closet, interior sitting area, and private patio with ocean views. The primary guestroom and the Ohana have private patios as well.

Beyond your private paradise, you'll enjoy privileged access to the superb offerings of Hualalai Resort, including the swimming pool, the Tom Weiskopf-designed golf course, tennis courts, and a spa. The beach at the Four Seasons Hualalai is about a mile and a half away, and you're an easy drive from Mauni Lani Golf and Hapuna Beach.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

HAWAII TAX ID #: TA-068-704-8704-01

listing.listing_description:
Perfectly positioned in plush Dover Heights, this villa offers fine views of downtown Sydney, with stylish interiors and a lush private garden. Guests can pass through a charming alfresco and barbecue area to a pristine blue pool, ringed by palm fronds and green trees. The separate living rooms, game room and airy balcony add to the appeal, with Sydney’s harbor and beaches tantalising close by.

 Guests will note the contemporary decor and clean, bright layout of the villa right away as they enter the sunlit front living room, which offers welcoming, wall-length furniture for weary travellers. Complete with entertainment system and impressive gas-fed fireplace, this is the ideal room to fall into for a relaxing afternoon or wind-down evening. With a separate TV room and a game room complete with pool table, guests’ kids can let their hair down and blow off steam in ample space, with enough room for everyone across this expansive property. With easy walk-out access to the garden, guests can utilize these spaces (plus the fully equipped kitchen) to cook, chat and converse in total contentment,

 The villa’s location allows for easy access to both the culinary and sightseeing delights of Sydney’s harbor, as well as the sun and sand of the city’s famous beaches. World-renowned Bondi Beach is just a handful of minutes, or a short walk, south by car, with Tamarama and Bronte beaches being even closer to the villa. Less than five minutes drive to the north, a host of golf clubs, plus waterside parks, cafes and walkways provide a wealth of day-time relaxation options along the leafy southern shore of the harbour. Guests have access to a range of world-class cosmopolitan dining and night-life options as evening closes in, with Sydney’s all-action downtown just a short ride away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Experience the raw, beautiful combination of unpolished terrain and modern luxury at this Melbourne property. Located in the heart of Red Hill, you’ll be exposed to the best of coast and country. British interior designer Vanessa Valentine brings together rustic charm with sumptuous furnishings, artful décor, and a warm, inviting colour scheme. Take a tranquil stroll through your private acreage.

From the living room, gaze out floor-to-ceiling windows to the panoramic scenes of secluded Phillip Bay and the surrounding landscape. Expansive glass doors open onto the terrace where you’ll find an inviting, royal blue infinity pool and the glittering ocean beyond. You’ll love to cook up a seafood storm in the bespoke kitchen using fresh produce from nearby markets; serve dinner alfresco under a starlit sky. Why not soak in the hot tub as you watch the sun setting over the lush hilltops? The in-house gym is fully equipped to help you work off your daily indulgences.

Your pick of golf courses and local vineyards are minutes away; book a wine tasting tour and bring your favourite bottle home to uncork and sip in front of the impressive limestone fireplace. Pack a picnic basket and drive a short, scenic route to the endless stretches of shoreline along the Mornington Peninsula. An upstairs game room, with a private balcony offering sweeping views over the backyard, features a billiards table and video game console.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Let yourself be enchanted by the lush surroundings and panoramic coastal views at Mendaka. This incredible vacation rental on the grassy tropical island of Sumba belongs to the owner of the Nihi Sumba Resort, which was rated the number one hotel in the world by Travel + Leisure in 2016. Book the five individual villas that make up this luxury property for an upscale family reunion, an idyllic getaway with friends or a warm-weather destination wedding.

Your stay at Nihi Sumba includes butler service, in-villa dining, three meals each day and non-alcoholic beverages, with spa treatments and excursions available at extra cost. Spend your holiday by the infinity pool overlooking the ocean or underneath the waterfall, which cascades into a pool and hides a secret massage cave at its base. Listen to the waves from the loungers and daybeds on the beachfront terrace, or while enjoying a drink or meal at the outdoor living and dining areas.

Tucked into verdant landscaping for privacy, the charming villas were inspired by traditional Sumbanese architecture, with thatched roofs and breezy layouts. The living and dining spaces use local pieces throughout, from carvings and antiques to vibrant ikat prints. Soft-hued Sulawesi marble floors inlaid with teak are a luxe touch underfoot, and built-in bookcases and woven ceiling panels add warmth to the rooms.

Each of the five villas has its own private plunge pool, as well as a bedroom with a king bed, en-suite bathroom, lounge area and balcony overlooking the ocean. The arrangement of the villas makes each one feel secluded, letting you use any of them for a honeymoon-style romantic escape.

The hidden-away charms of Mendaka are just a short walk from the shared amenities at Nihiwatu, from the beach club and boathouse to the restaurant, bars and even a chocolate factory. Stroll the stretch of private beach, sign up for a surf lesson, follow a local guide on a horseback ride or book a treatment on a “spa safari” to a stunning nearby valley.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Casa Evaliza is a stunning luxury villa on the island of Bali, just steps from Petitenget Beach near Seminyak. Nestled on 1,200 square meters of lush private estate, the villa offers a secluded hideaway within walking distance of some of Seminyak's finest restaurants, clubs, and cultural attractions. Ample alfresco living and dining areas, elegant interiors, outstanding staff and services, and four bedroom suites including a kid-friendly bunkroom provide ideal accommodations for families and destination wedding guests.

The villa's garden terrace features a lush lawn and fourteen-meter swimming pool like a tropical lagoon beside the pavilions. Step into the sparkling water to swim laps or play with the children, dipping your heads under the cool waterfall. Returning from the beach in the afternoon, repair to the alfresco dining table for a delicious, home-cooked lunch in the dappled shade. Then savor cocktails in the cool and sumptuous lounge.

Beautiful doors open into the villa's pavilions, allowing the entire home to breathe the garden-scented air. Buddhist-inspired artwork and décor, native wood accents, and a combination of contemporary and vintage furnishings infuse the spaces with a deep tranquility. The cavernous, open-plan great room with vaulted ceilings and open walls sets the scene for serene evenings together. Enjoy aperitifs in the lounge and gather around the beautiful wood dining table for fine feasts of Southeast Asian fare. At night, cuddle up with a favorite movie in the spacious media room.

There are three bedrooms with queen beds as well as a kids' bunkroom. All four bedrooms feature ensuite bathrooms, TVs, safes, and air conditioning, providing dreamy private sanctuaries for guests of all ages. The master suite and the primary guest suite include deep soaking tubs in their ensuite bathrooms.

Casa Evaliza offers an ideal balance of cloistered seclusion and convenient access to the finest elements of Seminyak. You're a nine-minute walk to Seminyak Square and an easy stroll to Petitenget Beach. Seminyak Beach is also within walking distance or a few minutes' drive, while Finn's Recreation Club is about five kilometers away. The villa is on the same road as the Club at Legian Suites Hotel and a short walk from the upscale KU DE TA restaurant.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
